trans-unit.source: This class belongs to the built-in object model category.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別屬於內建的物件模型類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether searches are performed with the global flag (`/g`), matching all occurrences.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否在使用全域旗標執行搜尋 (`/g`)，比對所有項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if global searches are performed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果您執行全域搜尋;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether searches are performed with the case-insensitive flag (`/i`).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否使用不區分大小寫的旗標，來執行搜尋 (`/i`)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if case-insensitive searches are performed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果您執行不區分大小寫的搜尋。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the last successful match.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定上次成功的相符項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the last successful match, if there was one.
trans-unit.target: 最後一個成功比對，如果有一個索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether searches are performed with the multiline flag (`/m`).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否在使用多行的旗標執行搜尋 (`/m`)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if searches are performed in multiline mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在多行模式，來執行搜尋否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the regular expression pattern that is represented by this object.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個物件所代表的規則運算式模式。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern that is represented by this object.
trans-unit.target: 此物件所代表的規則運算式模式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this object that contains the regular expression pattern and flags.
trans-unit.target: 建立此物件，其中包含規則運算式模式和旗標的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this object.
